item.title: Ticket #1467 (foreach( $metavalues ) in pluggable-functions.php causes PHP warnings) updated
item.dc:creator: davidhouse

item.title: Ticket #1467 (foreach( $metavalues ) in pluggable-functions.php causes PHP warnings) created
item.dc:creator: davidhouse
item.description:
wp-includes/pluggable-functions.php:42 has a foreach() statement that loops over a user's meta. However, this gives warnings when creating a new user and when promoting a user from level 0 level 1. If you have PHP's ini setting display_errors set to 'on', it even causes a crash when promoting a user into an author as the header() call fails.

Patch: 

--- ../xmouse/wp-includes/pluggable-functions.php       2005-06-19 09:33:44.000000000 +0100
+++ wp-includes/pluggable-functions.php 2005-06-24 09:45:27.270279048 +0100
@@ -39,8 +39,10 @@
        $metavalues = $wpdb->get_results("SELECT meta_key, meta_value FROM $wpdb->usermeta WHERE user_id = '$user_id'");
-       foreach ( $metavalues as $meta )
-               $user->{$meta->meta_key} = $meta->meta_value;
+       if ($metavalues) {
+               foreach ( $metavalues as $meta )
+                       $user->{$meta->meta_key} = $meta->meta_value;
+       }
        $cache_userdata[$user_id] = $user;

item.title: Ticket #1465 (Minor fix to _page_level_out()) created
item.dc:creator: kapowaz
item.description: Line 395 of /wp-includes/template-functions-post.php uses echo rather than concatenating to $output, despite the function taking an argument to either echo or return the output, meaning several newlines get echoed regardless.

item.title: Ticket #1464 (wp-atom.php produces invalid enclosure) updated
item.dc:creator: raster
item.description:
Keywords changed

There may not be a good solution for Atom 0.3, meaning aggregator support for enclosures in Atom 0.3 is not a standard feature. While support in aggregators may not be standard, this could be used: <link rel="related" type="audio/mpeg" href="â€‹http://foo.com/foo.mp3" /> as it does validate, which is probably better than not validating.
